sections.title: Key Risks & Mitigants
sections.content:
Key Risks:
- HIGH: Leverage ratio exceeds 4.0x policy limit.
- CONNECTED PARTY RISK: NextGen AI Ltd. via TechCorp Inc. -> TechGlobal Holdings -> NextGen AI Ltd. is Speculative risk.

Valuation.justification: Valuation derived from DCF (WACC/Terminal Value) and Comparable Multiples.
key_factors: High Leverage Penalty applied to WACC

Risk Score.justification: Assigned Corporate Rating BB and facility ratings based on LGD/RR models.
key_factors: Connected Party Risk: NextGen AI Ltd.

Sentiment.justification: Sentiment derived from news flow and analyst dispersion.

System Two.justification: Review of coherence between financial metrics and qualitative signals.
